string.value: #b#@1022007:##k in #bPerion#k says #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k will be able to solve the last mystery. But first, let's talk to #b#@1022007:##k.
Let's ask #b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k for help in order to solve the mystery of the white portion on the #rDirty Treasure Map#k, since he's known to be an extremely reliable source.
#b#@1052001:##k in #bKerning City#k says he may be able to reveal the white portion of the #rDirty Treasure Map#k. Let's talk to him.

string.name: rewardSummary
string.value: Exp 1000 Able to proceed to 'The Mystery of the White Portion' as next quest.
Finally, the curse has been released. And your map is slowly coming along.\nIf you want to remove the remaining white--actually, I don't know how to remove the white. I'm sorry!

You may have to ask another person for help. I know who you can ask. He'll definitely know what to do since he's known to be the most reliable source of information in all of Victoria Island.\n\nAre you ready?
That person is Dark Lord in Kerning City. You can find him in the secret basement of a bar there.
You're a Pirate from Nautilus.\nWhat brings you here? Are you here to ask for my help?

Hmm...a Treasure Map...that's interesting.

Let me take a look at it.

Why don't you get some rest while I take a moment to examine this?
I've examined the Map. I noticed that you were able to solve the mysteries hidden behind the green and red portions on the map.\n
